requestPhotos.title: SwipeClean
requestPhotos.subtitle: To help you organize your photos, we need access to your full photo library. This allows you to review and clean up all your memories.
requestPhotos.limitedBanner: You've given limited access. Tap here to grant full access in Settings.

limitedAccess.title: Limited access
limitedAccess.body: Only {{count}} photos available. Grant Full Access to review everything.

deck.title: Review Photos
deck.keepPhotoHint: Keep this photo in your library
